data.title: The Ultimate Simpsons Family Tree
data.meta_description: The cartoon show, Simpson family consists of fictional characters. These fictional characters are made to act in a way that makes the cartoon show famous throughout the world.
data.text:
1. The Simpson Family

The cartoon show, Simpson family, consists of fictional characters. The Simpson family is a nuclear family, including the married couple Homer and Marge. These fictional characters are made to act in a way that makes the cartoon show famous throughout the world. Homer and Marge have three children Bart, Lisa, and Maggie. The characters live in the fictional town of Springfield in 742 Evergreen Terrace, in the United States. The family does not include only the five members, but other characters are there.

The side characters include grandpa Simpson, the father of Homer, called Abraham. The family includes Homer's mother Mona, the pets, Santa's little helper, and the Snowball. The show also presents Marge's sisters Patty and Selma Bouvier.

The father, Simpson, called Homer, works as a safety inspector at the Springfield nuclear power plant. Homer has a careless and joker personality. His wife, Marge, was a housewife and a mother. The three children: Bart, who was ten years old and had a trouble-making personality. Lisa was eight years old and was intelligent compared to other family members. Maggie was a toddler and spoke in the baby's language. The family also owns two pets; a dog called Santa's little helper and a cat, Snowball II.

What Makes the Simpson Family Popular?

The cartoon show is almost thirty years old. But still, the show is popular among the masses. The reasons why people love the Simpson family so much are described below.

Spoiler Warning: Spoilers are also included in multiple places in this article.

2. The Simpsons Family Tree

You will enjoy it a lot as we will discuss the Simpson family tree in this section. You can learn from here and discuss the cartoon show characters in front of your friends to flex.

Let's start from the Homer family origin. Mona Simpson, the mother of Homer, married Abraham, who is already the father of two Simpson children called Herbert Powell and Abbey Simpson. Both Abraham and Mona were the father and mother of Homer, the main character in the show.

Now, see Marge's family lineage. Clancy Bouvier and Jacqueline Ingrid were married. They have three children called Marjorie Simpson, Selma Bouvier, and Patty Bouvier. Homer and Marjorie married and produced children called Bartholomew Jojo Simpson, Lisa Marry Simpson, and Maggie Simpson.

3. How to Draw Simpson Family Trees Online?

If you want to make your own Simpson family tree from scratch, we recommend you use EdrawMax Online, developed by a well-known software industry called Wondershare. The application is so powerful and lets its users make a perfect diagram in minutes with drag-and-drop functionality. The application allows users to make over two hundred and eighty diagram types. The application has more than five thousand diagram symbols.
